review: Great addition to the tv entertainment center. Plugs right into the tv with no problems and was able to get it up and running with a couple of minutes. If you don't have a prime membership, I wouldn't recommend buying this as you can buy a roku or something else to get the same thing minus the amazon support. Very fast for a device the size of a thumb drive, streams music and videos almost seamlessly as long as it can get a good wifi signal. Tons of apps and and games to play around with, and about half the price of the fire tv.
author: Anthony
